entry.title: 24 Oras Breaking News: Coronavirus cases worldwide surpass 4 million — AFP tally

media:group.media:title: 24 Oras Breaking News: Coronavirus cases worldwide surpass 4 million — AFP tally
media:group.media:description:
The number of novel coronavirus cases recorded worldwide surpassed four million on Saturday, according to an AFP tally based on official sources, as of 2145 GMT. There are now at least 4,001,437 cases of coronavirus around the world, with 277,127 deaths.

entry.title: GMA NEWS COVID-19 BULLETIN: Metro Manila mayors recommend 3 scenarios after May 15

media:group.media:title: GMA NEWS COVID-19 BULLETIN: Metro Manila mayors recommend 3 scenarios after May 15
media:group.media:description:
The Metro Manila Council will recommend to the Inter-Agency Task Force on Emerging Infectious Diseases three scenarios after the second extension of the enhanced community quarantine (ECQ) ends on May 15.

media:group.media:title: 24 Oras Weekend Express: May 9, 2020 [HD]
media:group.media:description:
Narito ang mga balitang ating tinutukan ngayong Sabado, May 9, 2020:
- BFP, namigay ng food packs para sa 1,500 beneficiaries
- Malacañang: Hindi lahat ng lugar sa Metro Manila ay naka-GCQ na sa May 16
- 40-anyos na lalaki, arestado sa paggahasa umano ng 17-anyos na babae sa gitna ng lockdown
- 3 araw na brownout sa Brgy. Krus na Ligas, dahil daw sa sumabog na transformer
- DOH COVID-19 numbers
- DepEd: Klase sa public at private schools sa bansa, magbubukas sa Aug. 24
- Ilang celebrity kids at moms, sweet and simple ang mga pakulo para sa Mother's Day
- Ilang lugar sa Cabiao, Nueva Ecija, inulan ng yelo/ngayong ubod nang init, umandar na naman ang pagiging chill ng mga Pinoy
